!Iason Heine: Ah, please--come here, come here! I've had a look over that page, and I have good news and bad news in equal measure. First the bad: the document was written in heavy, heavy slang, meaning I've had to best-guess several whole phrases. There were also some markings on the contract which made some sections illegible.... [Quest _196_SevenSignsSealoftheEmperor iasonheine_q196_1a.htm|"Oh... what about the good news?"]
